item.title: 瑞银报告称富裕客户对艺术品更加谨慎，去年艺术品销售额下降
item.description: 瑞士银行瑞银周四发布的《艺术市场报告》显示，由于最富有的买家减少购买，去年全球艺术品销售额下降了4%，约为650亿美元。【原文：Global art sales fell 4% last year to around $65 billion, as the wealthiest buyers reduced purchases, according to the Art Market Report, published by Swiss bank UBS on Thursday.】

item.title: 马什称全球商业保险费率出现七年来首次季度下降
item.description: 经纪商和风险顾问公司 Marsh 周四发布的全球保险市场指数显示，2024 年第三季度全球商业保险费率下降了 1%，这是七年来首次出现季度下降。【原文：Global commercial insurance rates fell 1% in the third quarter of 2024, the first quarterly decline recorded in seven years, the Global Insurance Market Index by broker and risk advisor Marsh on Thursday showed.】

item.title: 工人拒绝最新劳资协议后波音股价下跌 2.7
item.description: 周四，波音公司股价在美股盘前交易中下跌 2.7%，此前约 33,000 名罢工工人投票拒绝了新的劳资协议，从而加深了这家美国飞机制造商的危机。【原文：Boeing shares fell 2.7% in U.S. premarket trading on Thursday after about 33,000 striking workers voted to reject a new labor offer, deepening the crisis at the U.S. planemaker a day after it reported a $6 billion loss.】

item.title: 西班牙制药商罗维将保留第三方生产业务
item.description: 西班牙制药商罗维公司（Rovi）周四表示，在审查了几份无约束力的报价后，将不会出售其第三方合同开发与生产业务（CDMO）。【原文：Spanish drugmaker Rovi will not sell its third-party contract development and manufacturing business (CDMO) after reviewing several non-binding offers, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 联合利华在抵制声中对印尼市场进行 "大刀阔斧 "的改革
item.description: 联合利华（Unilever）财务总监周四表示，联合利华将在印度尼西亚进行 "大刀阔斧 "的改革，因为消费者抵制跨国品牌是对加沙战争的回应，这将加剧联合利华现有的分销问题。【原文：Unilever will make "drastic" changes in Indonesia, its finance chief said on Thursday as consumers boycott multinational brands in response to the war in Gaza and exacerbate the business' existing distribution problems.】

item.title: 赫伯罗特上调全年展望，因需求强于预期
item.description: 德国国际航运公司赫伯罗特（Hapag-Lloyd）周四表示，将上调全年盈利指导，理由是需求强于预期，且运费有所改善。【原文：German international shipping company Hapag-Lloyd said on Thursday that it is raising its full-year earnings guidance, citing stronger-than-expected demand and improved freight rates.】

item.title: 英国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，预算案公布前英国商业增长创 11 个月新低
item.description: 一项调查显示，由于工党政府首份预算案出台前的不确定性打击了人们的信心，10月份英国企业报告的增长速度为11个月来最慢，招聘人数也出现了今年以来的首次萎缩。【原文：British businesses reported their slowest growth in 11 months in October and hiring shrank for the first time this year as uncertainty ahead of the Labour government's first budget dampened confidence, a survey showed.】

item.title: 特斯拉发布重要电动汽车增长预测，消除投资者担忧，股价大涨
item.description: 特斯拉公司周四盘前交易中股价大涨近 12%，此前一天，该公司预测汽车销量将大幅增长，并向投资者保证首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）仍在寻求扩大该公司销售电动汽车的核心业务。【原文：Tesla stock shot up nearly 12% in pre-market trade on Thursday, a day after it forecast surging car sales growth, reassuring investors that CEO Elon Musk was still looking to expand the company's core business of selling electric vehicles.】

item.title: PMI显示欧元区商业活动陷入困境
item.description: 周四的一项调查显示，欧元区本月的商业活动再次停滞不前，仍处于收缩区间，原因是尽管企业勉强提高了价格，但国内外需求均有所下降。【原文：Euro zone business activity stalled again this month, remaining in contractionary territory as demand from both home and abroad fell despite firms barely increasing their prices, a survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道欧洲航天局称正与 SpaceX 就解决太空垃圾问题进行谈判
item.description: 欧洲航天局局长约瑟夫-阿施巴赫告诉路透社记者，该局正在与 SpaceX 公司就埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空企业加入一项旨在减少日益增多的太空碎片群的国际宪章的可能性进行谈判。【原文：The European Space Agency is in talks with SpaceX about the possibility of Elon Musk's space venture joining an international charter designed to reduce a growing swarm of debris in space, Director General Josef Aschbacher told Reuters.】

item.title: 日本央行称，日本银行应对市场尾部风险保持警惕
item.description: 日本央行周四表示，日本的银行拥有充足的资本基础，但需要对包括全球金融市场发展和地缘政治危险在内的尾部风险保持警惕。【原文：Japanese banks have sufficient capital bases but need to be vigilant against tail risks including developments in global financial markets and geopolitical perils, the Bank of Japan said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国 CATL 推出用于增程型混合动力汽车的新型电池
item.description: 中国电池巨头 CATL 周四推出了首款专注于增程型混合动力汽车的电池产品，而这一电动汽车类别的销量在所有细分市场中增长最快。【原文：Chinese battery giant CATL on Thursday launched its first battery product focused on extended-range hybrids at a time when this category of electrified cars is seeing the fastest growth in sales among all segments.】

item.title: 欧洲最高法院在长期反垄断案中裁定英特尔胜诉
item.description: 欧洲最高法院--欧盟法院裁定英特尔胜诉，结束了这家美国芯片制造商与欧盟监管机构之间长达近二十年的争斗。【原文：EU Court of Justice, Europe's top court, ruled in favour of Intel, ending a nearly two decade-long fight between the U.S. chipmaker and EU regulators who had said it had tried to thwart a rival.】

item.title: 尽管对 2024 年营业利润发出警告，Kering 股价仍然上涨
item.description: 开云集团（Kering）周四股价上涨，尽管该法国奢侈品公司周三表示，由于中国需求疲软，其2024年营业收入将减少近一半，达到多年来的最低点。【原文：Shares in Kering were in positive territory Thursday despite the French luxury goods saying on Wednesday its 2024 operating income would almost halve to its lowest in years due to weak demand in China.】

item.title: 特斯拉销量预期强劲，法兰克福股价大涨 12
item.description: 由于强劲的销售预测令投资者欢欣鼓舞，特斯拉在法兰克福上市的股票周四上涨 12%，创两周新高。【原文：Tesla's Frankfurt-listed shares rose 12% to a two-week high on Thursday, as a strong sales forecast cheered investors.】

item.title: 哈利-波特》出版商布卢姆斯伯里因奇幻小说需求而提前完成 24-25 财年业绩预期
item.description: 英国布鲁姆斯伯里出版公司（Bloomsbury Publishing）周四表示，在莎拉-J-马斯（Sarah J Maas）的奇幻小说作品再创佳绩的推动下，该公司上半年收入猛增 32%，2024-2025 财年的交易额将超过目前的预期。【原文：UK's Bloomsbury Publishing on Thursday said trading in fiscal year 2024-2025 will be ahead of current expectations, after posting a 32% jump in first-half revenue, driven by another round of blockbuster performance of Sarah J Maas's fantasy fiction titles.】

item.title: 法国法院批准阿托斯救援计划
item.description: 法国技术集团 Atos 周四表示，该公司提出的加速重组计划已获得楠泰尔商事法院的批准。【原文：French technology group Atos has received approval from the Nanterre Commercial Court for its proposed accelerated restructuring plan, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 英美资源集团第三季度铜和钻石产量下降，2024 年指导不变
item.description: 全球矿业公司英美资源集团（Anglo American）周四公布，其第三季度铜和钻石产量均出现两位数的下降，但仍维持2024年铜和钻石产量指导不变。【原文：Global miner Anglo American on Thursday posted double-digit falls in its third quarter copper and diamond production but kept its 2024 guidance unchanged for both.】

item.title: 联合利华第三季度基本销售额超出预期
item.description: 联合利华通过产品创新和放慢提价速度赢得了更多购物者的青睐，实现了三年半以来最大的销售量增长，季度基本销售额略好于预期。【原文：Unilever achieved slightly better than expected underlying quarterly sales after winning back more shoppers with product innovations and slower price increases, posting its biggest gain in sales volumes in three-and a-half-years.】

item.title: LSEG 第三季度收入增长 9.5%，超出预期
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（London Stock Exchange Group）周四表示，受年度认购额增加的影响，第三季度收入同比增长 9.5%，好于预期。【原文：London Stock Exchange Group said on Thursday that its income rose a better-than-expected 9.5% in the third quarter versus a year earlier, helped by higher annual subscription value.】

item.title: 巴克莱第三季度利润超预期增长 18%，投资银行业绩喜人
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）周四表示，该公司第三季度利润增长了 18%，原因是其投资银行在此期间从企业交易和交易的增长中获利，这与华尔街竞争对手的业绩不谋而合。【原文：Barclays' third quarter profit rose 18%, it said on Thursday, as its investment bank cashed in on a jump in corporate dealmaking and trading during the period, echoing Wall Street rivals.】

item.title: 爱马仕第三季度销售额增长 11.3%，继续超越竞争对手
item.description: Birkin包制造商爱马仕（Hermes）周四公布第三季度销售额增长11.3%，继续超越因中国经济下滑而遭受重创的竞争对手，其奢侈手袋吸引了富裕的购物者。【原文：Birkin bag maker Hermes reported on Thursday an 11.3% rise in third-quarter sales, continuing to outshine rivals hit hard by a downturn in China as its luxury handbags lure wealthy shoppers.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 WiseTech 公司首席执行官辞职，立即生效
item.description: 澳大利亚 WiseTech Global 公司周四表示，公司首席执行官理查德-怀特（Richard White）将立即下台，而就在两天前，当地媒体刚刚报道了他与一位据说是他前情人的女性之间的诉讼达成和解。【原文：Australia's WiseTech Global said on Thursday its chief executive, Richard White, will step down with immediate effect, just two days after local media reported the settlement of a lawsuit between him and a woman reported to be his former lover.】

item.title: KKR 将以 29 亿欧元收购埃尼生物燃料部门 25% 的股份
item.description: 意大利能源集团埃尼公司周四表示，美国基金 KKR 将收购 Enilive 公司 25% 的股份，整个生物燃料部门的估值为 117.5 亿欧元（126.8 亿美元）。【原文：Italian energy group Eni said on Thursday that U.S. fund KKR would take a 25% stake in Enilive, in a deal that values the entire biofuel unit at 11.75 billion euros ($12.68 billion).】

item.title: Nvidia 在印度推出印地语人工智能模型，首席执行官黄仁勋到访印度
item.description: 芯片巨头英伟达公司（Nvidia）周四针对印度广泛使用的印地语推出了一款轻量级人工智能模型，希望借此开拓日益增长的人工智能技术市场。【原文：Chip behemoth Nvidia launched a lightweight artificial intelligence model on Thursday for India's widely-used Hindi language, as it looks to tap into a growing market for AI technologies.】

item.title: 法国达能保持 2024 年目标，第三季度销售额超预期
item.description: 法国食品集团达能周四公布的第三季度销售额超出预期，原因是价格上涨进一步放缓导致销量增加，同时也反映出北美市场对高蛋白产品、咖啡奶精和水的需求强劲。【原文：French food group Danone beat third-quarter sales expectations on Thursday, boosted by higher sales volumes as price hikes slowed further, and reflecting strong demand in North America for high-protein products, coffee creamers and waters.】

item.title: 非洲和中东地区业绩强劲，推动 Orange 第三季度业绩增长
item.description: Orange 周四公布的第三季度利润略高于市场预期，主要得益于非洲和中东业务的强劲表现。【原文：Orange on Thursday reported third-quarter profit that was slightly ahead of market expectations, driven by a strong performance at its Africa and Middle East business.】

item.title: 雷诺第三季度销量增长 1.8%，超出预期
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺周四报告称，由于对高价新车型的强劲需求帮助其抵消了总销量的下降，季度收入意外增长。【原文：French carmaker Renault reported an unexpected rise in quarterly revenues on Thursday, as strong demand for its pricier new models helped it offset lower total volumes.】

item.title: 法国餐饮企业索迪斯 2025 财年增长放缓
item.description: 法国餐饮企业索迪斯（Sodexo）在周四公布了截至8月31日的年度业绩报告，预计其2025财年的有机增长率将放缓至5.5%至6.5%之间。【原文：French food caterer Sodexo expects its organic growth to slow down to between 5.5% and 6.5% in the 2025 financial year, it said on Thursday after reporting slightly higher than expected growth for the year through Aug. 31.】

item.title: 现代汽车第三季度营业利润同比下降 7
item.description: 现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor Co）周四报告称，该公司第三季度营业利润下降了 7%，这表明全球汽车需求放缓正在影响这家韩国汽车制造商。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co on Thursday reported a 7% fall in third-quarter operating profit in a sign the global slowdown in car demand is impacting the South Korean carmaker.】
